name: A Skull
description:
A short visual novel to probe the recesses of the psyche.

Featuring:

  • Multiple endings (ten of 'em)
  • Metaphysical strangeness
  • Intoxicating images
  • Music by me, Alpha Chrome Yayo
  • A skull!

This is my first game, made in Ren'Py, from a dude with zero prior knowledge about this sort of thing.

It's free and in working order, although I'll likely be tweaking it here and there. If something doesn't work, feel free to let me know.

There's zero need to pay, but I am of course most grateful if you like it and feel like donating a buck or two. Or better still, check out my music on Bandcamp.
